skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Swordplayer
skillTree.description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Student of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Those who seek greater understanding of the world may turn to Hoeth for knowledge and guidance.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Shem's Burning Gaze"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shem's Burning Gaze Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shem's Burning Gaze Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Harmonic Convergence"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Harmonic Convergence Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Spirit Leech Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma
skillTree.description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Melkoth's Mystifying Miasma Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.name: Deviant
backgroundSkills.description: In society, one must learn to conform. Or not, as the case may be…

backgroundSkills.name: Advocate
backgroundSkills.description: Good ideas oft-times need vocal, public support to turn them into reality.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciple
backgroundSkills.description: This one is happy to follow and let other, more energetic types, lead from the front.

backgroundSkills.name: Frigid
backgroundSkills.description: Stiff, starched, formal. Inflexible.

backgroundSkills.name: Fruitful
backgroundSkills.description: Industrious and productive, this one can turn ideas into gold - sometimes literally.

backgroundSkills.name: Fecund
backgroundSkills.description: Never short of new ideas, or new ways of looking at old problems.

backgroundSkills.name: Rebel
backgroundSkills.description: A subversive agitator, and clinically non-conformist to boot.

backgroundSkills.name: Healer
backgroundSkills.description: Armies can be mended as surely as people can, up to a point of course.

backgroundSkills.name: Medic
backgroundSkills.description: "I see something wrong and I fix it with my hands."

backgroundSkills.name: Squishy
backgroundSkills.description: Some warriors are like rocks - hard and immovable. This one is like jelly…

backgroundSkills.name: Elusive
backgroundSkills.description: This one moves like lightning, ducking and twisting to avoid their opponent's blows.

backgroundSkills.name: Resilient
backgroundSkills.description: Armour is just a formality when you're as hard as nails and as tough as old boots.

backgroundSkills.name: Feeble
backgroundSkills.description: It's surprising that this one can even lift a pen, let alone a sword.

backgroundSkills.name: Fortuitous
backgroundSkills.description: Chance is like magic - it can be harnessed to the individual's will.

backgroundSkills.name: Protected
backgroundSkills.description: "If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."

backgroundSkills.name: Mooncalf
backgroundSkills.description: "There are people living inside Morrslieb - right inside, yes - and they want to take over the world!"

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: -5% when increasing

backgroundSkills.name: Primed
backgroundSkills.description: Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing

backgroundSkills.name: Conductor
backgroundSkills.description: Through their veins a charge is racing. Energy, filling the ominous void within.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

backgroundSkills.name: Shivery
backgroundSkills.description: "Look, it's terribly cold. Can we get those things as far away from me as possible? Yes, that's right - on the flank."

backgroundSkills.name: Stimulated
backgroundSkills.description: The prospect of battle fills the phoenix with a brisk energy that's somewhat infectious...

backgroundSkills.name: Exhilarated
backgroundSkills.description: "Battle, you say? Today? Marvellous! Bring me my phoenix - let's get killing!"

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +50%

backgroundSkills.name: Disfavoured
backgroundSkills.description: This one is something of an eccentric; their erratic behaviour has upset powerful people, which is seldom a good idea.

effects.description: Upkeep: +20% for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lion of Chrace units

backgroundSkills.name: Widely Known
backgroundSkills.description: Through his words and deeds, this one has made a name for himself within noble Elven circles.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lion of Chrace units
Charge bonus: +5 for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units

backgroundSkills.name: Bladelord
backgroundSkills.description: "Enlightenment is achieved by mastering not only the body, but the soul. Only then can a warrior truly understand the value of life."

effects.description: Upkeep: -20% for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lion of Chrace units
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Swordmasters of Hoeth units (minimum 1)
Charge bonus: +10 for Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units

backgroundSkills.name: Flat-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Don't take this one along if you need to get away quickly… or maybe you should…

backgroundSkills.name: Fit
backgroundSkills.description: The very illustration of Elven perfection. What a git!

backgroundSkills.name: Athletic
backgroundSkills.description: Even for a long-limbed, long-lived Elf, this character is a fine specimen.
